text: Exine of pollengrain is made up of
hint: Exine is composed of sporopollenin, one of the most resistant organic materials; absent over germ pores. 15. If each pollen sac of a typical anther has 16 pollengrainshow many meiotic divisions occur in the anther to produce all these pollengrains? a) 16 b) 8 c) 32 d) 4 Key: a
